swapPairs((address,bytes)[]).details: The method checks how much gas is left, and stops before reaching the limit. So the last pairs in the array are less likely to be swapped. Will revert with ZeroPairsToSwap if _pairsToSwap is empty Will revert if called when paused

params._pairsToSwap: The list of pairs so swap

returns._amountSwapped: How many pairs were actually swapped

ZeroPairsToSwap().notice: Emitted when trying to swap an empty list of pairs

Swapped((address,bytes)[],uint256).notice: Emitted when a list of pairs is swapped correctly

findBestSwap(address).notice: This method isn't a view because the Uniswap quoter doesn't support view quotes. Therefore, we highly recommend that this method is not called on-chain. This method will return an empty set of bytes if the pair should not be swapped, and encode(max(uint24)) if there is no need to go to Uniswap

swapPairs((address,bytes)[]).notice: Takes a list of pairs to swap, and tries to swap as many as possible
